title: Move HTML unit depedency to bom/application/pom.xml

labels.name: area/housekeeping
labels.description: Issue type for generalized tasks not related to bugs or enhancements

body:
### Description

`net.sourceforge.htmlunit:htmlunit` is currently located in `build-parent.pom` [here](https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/blob/main/build-parent/pom.xml#L292).
I'd like to propose to move it to `bom/application/pom.xml` as `quickstarts/security-openid-connect-web-authentication` and `quickstarts/security-openid-connect-web-authentication` use it for testing and it is also recommended to use it for testing OIDC code flow in the OIDC docs, so it would be good if users did not have to enter specific versions and exclusions.

It is really an equivalent to RestAssured (which is in the application bom) but used mainly for testing interactive endpoints.

@aloubyansky @gsmet Are you OK with this proposal ?

### Implementation ideas

_No response_
